contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox National flag | Name = Cameroon | Article = | Type = National | Image = Flag of Cameroon.svg | Nickname = | Use = 111111 | Proportion = 2:3 | Adoption = May 20, 1975 | Design = A vertical tricolor of green, red and yellow, with a yellow star centered on a red band.. }} [[File:Flag of Cameroon (1961).svg|right|thumb|188px|Previous flag of Cameroon (1961-1975)]] [[File:Flag of Cameroon (1957).svg|right|thumb|188px|Flag of Cameroon (1957-1961)]] [[File:British Cameroons Flag.gif|right|thumb|188px|Flag of [[British Cameroons]] (1922-1948)]] [[File:Flag of Deutsch-Kamerun.svg|right|thumb|188px|Flag of [[Kamerun|German Cameroon]] ]] The national '''[[flag]] of [[Cameroon]]''' was adopted in its present form on 20 May 1975 after Cameroon became a unitary state. It is a vertical tricolor of green, red and yellow, defaced with a five-pointed star in its center. There is a wide variation in the size of the central star, although it is always contained within the inside stripe. The color scheme uses the traditional [[Pan-African colors]] (Cameroon becoming the second state to do so), and the [[tricolor flag|tricolor]] design is adapted from the [[flag of France]]. The center stripe is thought to stand for unity: [[red]] is the colour of unity, and the star is referred to as "the star of unity". The [[yellow]] stands for the sun, and also the [[savanna]]s in the northern part of the country, while the [[green]] is for the [[forest]]s in the southern part of Cameroon. The previous flag of Cameroon (1961-1975) had a similar color scheme, but with two gold (darker than the third stripe by comparison) stars in the upper half of the green. It was adopted following British South Cameroon's joining of the State of Cameroon.<ref> The International Flag Book in Color, Christian Fogd Pedersen, (1971)</ref> The original flag, first made law by Law 46 of 26 October 1957, was the simple tricolor. It was confirmed on 21 February 1960 in the new constitution. ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{FOTW|id=cm|title=Cameroon}} {{Africa topic|Flag of|title=[[Flags of Africa]]}} {{nationalflags}}<!-- to edit this table, go to [[Template:Nationalflags]] --> [[Category:National symbols of Cameroon]] [[Category:National flags|Cameroon]]
